## GridTools.IGridViewProps interface

Props for the GridView component. Displays a single grid instance with resource editing capabilities.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IGridViewProps extends IViewBaseProps 
```
**Extends:** [IViewBaseProps](./ts-res-ui-components.viewstatetools.iviewbaseprops.md)
